RasterType.__init__ÔÉÅ

RasterType.__init__(name: str, product_pattern: str, bands_pattern: str, bands: Dict[BandChannel, Band], masks: List[Band], date_format: str = '%Y%m%d-%H%M%S', maskfunc: str | None = None, nodata: float = -10000, masknodata: int = 1)[source]ÔÉÅ

Constructor

Parameters:

  • name (str) ‚Äì Display name of the rastertype

  • product_pattern (str) ‚Äì Pattern to identify a file corresponding to this RasterType The pattern can contain a capturing group corresponding to the product timestamp

  • bands_pattern (str) ‚Äì Pattern to identify a band file in the product. The pattern can contain a capturing group corresponding to the bands‚Äô identifiers in case bands are separated in different files

  • bands (dict(BandChannel, Band)) ‚Äì Dictionary associating the channel and the band definition for all available bands

  • masks ([Band]) ‚Äì List of bands that define the masks of the product type

  • date_format (str, optional, default="%Y%m%d-%H%M%S") ‚Äì Date format ot the product timestamp (used to convert a string to datetime)

  • maskfunc (str, optional, default=None) ‚Äì Name of the function to convert pixels of the band defined as the mask (typically the cloud mask) to boolean values.

  • nodata (float, optional, default=-10000) ‚Äì No data value of the raster product

  • masknodata (int, optional, default=1) ‚Äì No data value of the mask
